summary: Completed testing of Chart Annotations and Data Transformation features. Fixed a critical bug in DataTransformPage.jsx where column objects were being used as React children. All features are now working correctly.

backend: Login API works (13/13 pytest tests passed)
Transform preview API with filter transformation
Transform preview API with sort transformation
Transform preview API with disabled steps (correctly skipped)
Transform preview API with multiple steps
Line chart with reference line annotation
Area chart with highlight region annotation
frontend: Chart Studio loads with Annotations section for bar charts
Chart Studio shows Annotations section for line charts
Chart Studio shows Annotations section for area charts
Chart Studio hides Annotations section for pie charts (correct)
Add Annotation button opens annotation dialog
Annotation dialog shows 3 types: Text Label, Reference Line, Highlight Region
Annotation dialog has label input field
Annotation dialog has color picker
Dataset detail page shows Transform button with wand icon
Transform button navigates to /datasets/:id/transform
Data Transform page loads with dataset info (Sales Data 2026 • 10 rows • 3 columns)
Data Transform page shows Transformations panel with Add Step button
Data Transform page shows Columns panel with column names and types
Data Transform page shows Data Preview table
Add Transformation dialog shows all 7 transformation types (Filter Rows, Rename Column, Change Type, Calculate Field, Fill Missing, Drop Column, Sort Data)
Filter transformation can be configured (column, operator, value)
Transformation step is added and displayed with step number
Transformation step shows toggle switch (green when enabled)
Transformation step shows delete button (red trash icon)
Preview button applies transformations to data preview
Toggle switch enables/disables transformation steps
Delete button removes transformation step

bugs_fixed.issue: React error: Objects are not valid as a React child (found: object with keys {name, type})
bugs_fixed.fix: Normalized columns array to extract column names from column objects. Changed setColumns to map column objects to column name strings.

seed_data_used: Sales Data 2026 dataset (10 rows, 3 columns: Region, Sales, Quarter)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chart Annotations and Data Transformation features are fully functional. Chart Annotations section appears for bar/line/area chart types in Chart Studio. Data Transform page accessible via Transform button on dataset detail page. The columns state in DataTransformPage.jsx was fixed to normalize column objects to strings.

data_transformation.entry_point: Transform button on dataset detail page (data-testid='transform-btn')
transformation_types: Filter Rows - Remove rows based on conditions
Calculate Field - Create new calculated columns
Sort Data - Order rows by column
